Before You Come In

Ballard Chiropractic exists to heal from the inside out. We understand that when the body isnâ€™t functioning as it was designed to, the whole system gets buggy. We service a wide variety of patient needs by assessing and correcting mechanical dysfunctions of the body along with various other techniques.

However, we specialize in correcting cervical and lumbar (sciatica) disc disorders and identify and correct athletic injuries. Our goal is to send every patient home with a hug. A very big hug. We believe that happiness heals. Happiness is the key that unlocks your door. Come to Ballard Chiropractic for your happiness.
